summary: The document is a memorandum dated 27 June 1968, addressed to C/CI/OA, concerning Henry P. Lopez. It responds to a prior memorandum from 6 June 1968, detailing Lopez's residence in Mexico City from 1961 to August 1966, his operational travels across Central and Latin America, and his relocation to New York City in October 1969 due to his wife's health issues. His family status remained unchanged since 1965. Additionally, a Green List trace request was noted as submitted on 26 June 1968.
key_findings: Henry P. Lopez resided in Mexico City from 1961 to August 1966 with his family.
Lopez engaged in operational activities across Central and Latin America.
Relocated to New York City in October 1969 because of his wife's medical condition.
No alterations in family status since 1965.
Green List trace request initiated on 26 June 1968.
